content: Tool bag small ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool storage and transport systems > Soft bags and tool backpacks- - ### FEATURES:Features Better for the environment – Hilti tool bags are now built from 70% RPET: robust fabric made by recycling plastic bottles Ultra-durable – all-metal hardware, large zipper pull with metal teeth and water-resistant, tear-resistant fabric Flexible and efficient – carry any combination of tools with their accessories and inserts in one tool bag Easier to carry – medium and large size tool bags come with adjustable, padded shoulder strap with large metal rings Exterior pocket(s) – quick access to blades, bits, batteries and other small accessories (size and quantity vary according to tool bag) Applications Storage and transport of construction equipment Reducing the environmental footprint of your business ### TECHNICAL DATA: Types: Tool bags Dimensions (LxWxH): 12.6 x 7.9 x 9.8 in Technical Data | Types | Tool bags | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 12.6 x 7.9 x 9.8 in ### ITEMS- 2323710 - Tool bag small - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x S Soft Pouch
